::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

    They had not heard Razor C=
law ask them to stop, but they heard him the second time. Prime was walking=
 away, but he stopped and came back.
    "Is there something you need from =
us?" Prime asked.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 10:22 AM
  Sub=
ject: Re: Dachande respond or else


  It all started back when...


     -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
    Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
    Subject: Eclipse, Wolveri=
tron, and Ramus


    ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

        They had heard=
 the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict.=
 Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther t=
hey exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away

    So I responde=
d with...
    . 
    Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the=
 battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally reporte=
d his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they w=
ere out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his s=
word and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your cho=
ice."

    Then a few more posts of Razor Claw tracking them until finally =
Optimus Prime (Razor Claw doesn't know enough about Prime to recognise him)=
 Wolveritron, Ramus, and Eclipse were finally together. and Razor Claw caug=
ht up with them.(I can't find the cave posting I thought it was those three=
 that were in the same cave as Vuloise.)

    He aproached the three bots r=
eady for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully
